
---
title: 'IT之家专享：拼手速抢京东大额图书券，折后 3.3 折'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/4/53725072-0051-4557-91b2-e6f3ea11b579.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Fri, 23 Apr 2021 07:46:08 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/4/53725072-0051-4557-91b2-e6f3ea11b579.png'
---

<div>   
<p>京东现已开启读书日狂促活动，IT之家为大家争取来了一批大额券，券后满 600-360 元、满 400-240 元、满 300-200 元。折后 3.3 折，全场探底好价。</p><p>专享券数量非常有限，先到先得：<a id="zuihuimaidown" href="https://go.ruanmei.com/url.aspx?linkid=798" target="_blank" title="点击领取" data-androidurl="https://go.ruanmei.com/url.aspx?linkid=803" data-iosurl="https://go.ruanmei.com/url.aspx?linkid=802">点击领取</a>（需跳转最会买 App 领取）。</p><p>每人限领1张，请把专享券留给有需要的同学哦～</p><p><a id="zuihuimaidown" href="https://go.ruanmei.com/url.aspx?linkid=798" target="_blank" title="点击领取" data-androidurl="https://go.ruanmei.com/url.aspx?linkid=803" data-iosurl="https://go.ruanmei.com/url.aspx?linkid=802"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/4/53725072-0051-4557-91b2-e6f3ea11b579.png" id="1619163227196-1" title="IT之家专享：拼手速抢京东大额图书券，折后 3.3 折" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></a></p><p>京东图书日主会场现已开启，会场可领每满 100-50 元券，叠加之家专属券，可做到折后 3.3 折（以 300-200 元为例），非常划算：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" title="点此前往" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8AAPADIgZlGmsUMlZYDUUEJVtXQhRZUAscU0QLBAcKWUcYB0UHC15CWggFC0dHSkABBV4SZVBDFx05VHhxUSBIE2VmSkIiYg9meU1CDF9FTV1HUxwEAlBeTwllSCBLB2J0AW4-SkIRBE9oJndjEVwSa1cZMhcGXBNSEAMTA2UYWRIAFANQGFwlYXVpD18jYFhWbD0rWxAyWWlUK1gUABIGVBpeHAUiB1IbUxUFEQ5UE14XBCIHXRxrSUBARhcraxUDEwZUG1MUAhA3VitrJQAiBGVFNRRREVBQHA8XbEhYEFAbRl5FaVMZWB0AGwVlGVoUABA" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&">点此前往</a>。</p><p>如果没领到之家专享的 300-50 元券，主会场 18/20/21/22/23 点也会限量发放此券，有需求的小伙伴可蹲点抢。</p><p><a
